column4: hi, why isn't there an update for gnome to the latest stable version?
I just read gnome 2.16 has performance improvement
well you didnt try edgy yet
wait 4 weeks and you'll get it hassle-free through the update manager
oh god, it is the next ubuntu verison?
stable enough to work on it?
gnome/gtk itself yes, but not all applications on top of it
